channel.title: Installing ipb
channel.description:
I hate doing this, I feel like an idiot. But how do you install power boards? I've got a host, its at www.awardspace.com (It can use mysql and everything else needed). And I have the powerboards, thanks to ron's "how to get any program free tut" :). I've extracted them, and I'm stuck. Where would I go from this? What would I upload, and where?
Thanks in advance

item.title: Installing ipb
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

FTP the shit to your site and run the instal file?

Read full topic
